name: Careers
description: A React-based application for exploring global remote job opportunities with live listings powered by the Remotive API.

name: UnsplashBox
description: A modern React application that uses the Unsplash API to search, save, organize, and delete images.

name: IP Address Tracker
description: An IP address tracking app that displays location details such as country, city, and ISP on an interactive map.

name: Tip Calculator
description: A simple web app that helps users calculate tips and split bills based on service quality.
